idea:
The GoodBrokers aims to organize the real estate transaction journey in a unique uber-like format operated by certified, trained, and professional brokers riding on a tech-enabled platform used by all stakeholders. 


A customer gets a professional and trained broker for his house search and has a host of other value-added services like project due diligence, financing assistance, possession audit, and move-in assistance. 


A broker on the other hand uses the platform to access high intent leads, developer properties, and thereby organizes his real estate business better than he can individually manage.
name: The GoodBrokers

idea: Our Company is engaged in manufacturing of ASI-SC that are QUATS(quaternary ammonium compounds)i.e. The quaternary ammonium compounds based our product are widely used as disinfectants. Health-care–associated infections have been reported from contaminated quaternary ammonium compounds used to disinfect patient-care supplies or equipment, such as cystoscopes or cardiac catheters . The ASI SC are good cleaning agents, but high water hardness and materials such as cotton and gauze pads can make them less microbicidal because of insoluble precipitates or cotton and gauze pads absorb the active ingredients, respectively. One study showed a significant decline (~40%–50% lower at 1 hour) in the concentration of quaternaries released when cotton rags or cellulose-based wipers were used in the open-bucket system, compared with the nonwoven spunlace wipers in the closed-bucket system. As with several other disinfectants (e.g., phenolics, iodophors) gram-negative bacteria can survive or grow in them It has been attributed to the inactivation of energy-producing enzymes, denaturation of essential cell proteins, and disruption of the cell membrane746. Evidence exists that supports these and other possibilities
name: MRINANK HYCHEM PRIVATE LIMITED
